content: introducing spiral bloom a captivating crochet pattern that embodies the enchanting beauty of nature s blooms and vibrant garden hues this pattern utilises the intricate technique of overlay mosaic crochet which creates stunning multi-dimensional effects that bring each bloom to life the use of variegated yarn not only simplifies colour work but also creates a harmonious blend of colours that flow seamlessly mimicking the natural gradation found in petals spiral bloom is more than just a crochet pattern it s a journey into the artistry of yarn a statement piece that will add a touch of elegance to any collection whether you re a seasoned crocheter or looking to expand your skills size the finished square will be 8 20cm skill level this pattern is a great introduction to overlay mosaic crochet in the round for intermediate level hookers or adventurous beginners looking to take on a challenge yarn usage this square can be made with scrap yarns you do not need a full skein of either your contrast or main colour i hope you enjoy a simplified version of this pattern is also available for free here https //www crochethooksandmagic com/post/mosaic-spiral-bloom-free-crochet-pattern
